response.question: As of June 2023, how many states' highest honours have been conferred to India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi, over the last 9 years?
In June 2023, which of the following cricketers has become the first spinner in history to take three consecutive 5-wicket hauls in the One Day Internationals (ODIs)?
Name the women's doubles pair, which has won the 2023 World Table Tennis (WTT) Contender tournament in Tunis?
In June 2023, ADB approved a loan of USD 400 million to which of the following countries for the construction of 102 km-long dual gauge railways between Chattogram and Cox’s Bazar?
In June 2023, which of the following organizations has received a deal of $454 million for the digital transformation of Denmark’s Danske Bank?
What is the theme of International Day against Drug Abuse & Illicit Trafficking 2023, which is observed annually on 26th June?
John Bannister Goodenough, who passed away recently, was conferred with the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in which year?
What is the rank of India in the Global competitiveness index 2023, published by the International Institute for Management Development (IMD)?
Name the Indian personality, who was conferred with an honorary doctorate by Birmingham City University (BCU) in London, England. (June 2023)
In June 2023, which of the following life insurer launched 'Nishchit Pension Plan'?
